title: [Zortahg's Spine, Highroad]
description: A faint glimmer draws your attention to a stone block in the northern parapet, where a wire-thin band of metallic ore has caught a hint of light.  Knowing that it wouldn't still be there if it was of any monetary value, you realize that the block was probably placed there specifically to do what it has just done and brighten a possibly dull journey.
